segments.text: I am calling to consult you about the job as a copywriter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , what do you want to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The information is scanty for me . And can you describe the responsibilities of the position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Copywriters are supposed to design and write articles for the advertising company .
segments.speaker: S2
